comments.comments_text: A fantastic block by a defender means that the corner from Betis comes to nothing.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: A fantastic block by a defender means that the corner from [TEAM] comes to nothing.

comments.comments_text: The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet of Youssouf Sabaly (Betis) just outside the box. He doesn't think twice and fires a magnificent shot into the top left corner. His attempt was beyond the reach of Stole Dimitrievski, so the score changes to 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Fran Garcia sends a superb cross into the box. Santi Comesana (Rayo Vallecano) latches on to it and from near the penalty spot powers a header inside the right post, leaving Claudio Bravo beaten. He displayed his eye for goal there - excellent finish. The score is 2:1.
